overview.heading: Rockford Virtual Office
overview.body: Grab a coveted Rockford business address without the financial burden of a permanent office. With Opus VO, you get to plant your company’s flag in Rockford’s bustling business landscape—all without tapping into your savings. And when it’s crunch time for critical meetings or essential client presentations, our state-of-the-art conference rooms are at your service.  Choosing to go virtual in Rockford with Opus VO includes the perk of a dedicated live receptionist. We’re committed to making every client interaction an authentic extension of your distinct brand character. Leave the routine administrative tasks to us, so you can focus on what you do best—building your empire.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Rockford, Illinois even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Rockford. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Illinois.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Rockford virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Rockford? Why a Virtual Office?
sections.body: Don’t underestimate Rockford; it’s more than just a hub for manufacturing. It’s emerging as a diverse business nexus, with sectors like healthcare, tech, and retail making waves. A Rockford address gives you access to the people, places, and events that can take your business to the next level.  Going virtual with Opus VO in Rockford isn’t just a budget-friendly decision—it’s a calculated move for success. Are you set to up your game? Our exceptional virtual office services await you.  Choose from two Opus VO locations in Rockford @ 7210 E State Street, Rockford, IL 61108 or 1643 N. Alpine Road, Rockford, IL 61107
